item.title: Help with Testscape Ancients!

item.description:
@Maryn wrote:

OKay, your officially an idiot.
The Test ancients TUT is for ancients on NPCs.
im trying to configure this to be magic on players

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Testscape Ancients!
item.dc:creator: @Maryn Maryn
item.description:
@Maryn wrote:

Ok, recently, i wrote some code for ancients on players, but it doesnt hit! it just heals people.

here is the code i wrote from bits made by xvikeax and xero.

[code]if(spellID == 12861) //ice rush
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 58)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(562, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 2)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(562, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 2)==true))
{
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(20);
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
castOnPlayer.snare();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(361, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
addSkillXP((200playerLevel[6]), 6);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“You freeze the enemy!”);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(562), 2);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 58)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 58 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
if(spellID == 12987) // Shadow Rush
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 52)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(562, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(566, 1)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(562, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(566, 1)==true))
{
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(20);
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(379, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
addSkillXP((200playerLevel[6]), 6);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(562, getItemSlot(562), 2);
deleteItem(566, getItemSlot(566), 1);
deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 1);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 52)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 52 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
if(spellID == 13011) // Shadow Burst
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 64)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(562, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(566, 2)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(562, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(566, 2)==true))
{
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30);
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(382, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
addSkillXP((250playerLevel[6]), 6);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(562, getItemSlot(562), 4);
deleteItem(566, getItemSlot(566), 2);
deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 64)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 64 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
if(spellID == 12999) // Shadow Blitz
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 76)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(566, 2)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(566, 2)==true))
{
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(45);
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(381, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
addSkillXP((300playerLevel[6]), 6);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 2);
deleteItem(566, getItemSlot(566), 2);
deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 76)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 76 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
if(spellID == 12901) // Blood Rush
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 56)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(562, 2)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(562, 2)==true))
{
hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(25);
playerLevel[3] += hitDiff;
updateRequired = true;
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
//PkingDelay = 15;
addSkillXP((200playerLevel[6]), 6);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“You drain the enemy’s life and add it to yours.”);
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(373, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 1);
deleteItem(562, getItemSlot(562), 2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 56)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 56 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
if(spellID == 12919) // Blood Burst
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 68)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(562, 4)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(562, 4)==true))
{
hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(40);
playerLevel[3] += hitDiff;
updateRequired = true;
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
addSkillXP((300playerLevel[6]), 6);
sendMessage(“You drain the enemys life and add it to yours.”);
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(376, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 2);
deleteItem(562, getItemSlot(562), 4);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 67)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 68 to cast this spell.”);
}
}

if(spellID == 12939) // smoke rush
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 50)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(562, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(562, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==true))
{
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(20);
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(385, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
addSkillXP((200playerLevel[6]), 6);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(562, getItemSlot(562), 2);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 1);
deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 1);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 49)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 50 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
if(spellID == 12963) //smoke burst
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 62)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(562, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 2)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(562, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 2)==true))
{
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(35);
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(389, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
addSkillXP((250playerLevel[6]), 6);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(562, getItemSlot(562), 4);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 2);
deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 61)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 62 to cast this spell.”);
}
}

if(spellID == 12975) // smoke barrage (lvl 86 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 86)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 4)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 4)==true))
{
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(17);
castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
stillgfx(391, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(390, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
PkingDelay = 10;
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“You poison the enemy.”);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 2);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 4);
deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 4);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 85)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 86 to cast this spell.”);
}
}

if(spellID == 12881) // ice burst (lvl 70 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 70)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 4)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 4)==true))
{
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(34);
castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer();
castOnPlayer.uberentangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“You have been frozen!”);
sendMessage(“You poison and freeze the enemy!”);
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(363, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 2);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 4);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 69)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 70 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 94)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==true))
{
hitDiff = 20 + misc.random(88);
castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer();
castOnPlayer.uberentangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
castOnPlayer.hitUpdateRequired = true;
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“You have been frozen!”);
sendMessage(“You poison and freeze the enemy!”);
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 2);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
if(spellID == 12929) // blood barrage (lvl 92 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 92)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(566, 1)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(566, 1)==true))
{
hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(74);
playerLevel[3] += hitDiff;
updateRequired = true;
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
stillgfx(373, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(377, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
PkingDelay = 15;
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“Your life has been drained!”);
sendMessage(“You drain the enemys life and add it to yours.”);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 4);
deleteItem(566, getItemSlot(566), 1);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 91)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 92 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
if(spellID == 12951) // Smoke Blitz (Level 74 Spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 74)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(566, 2)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(566, 2)==true))
{
hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(74);
playerLevel[3] += hitDiff;
updateRequired = true;
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
stillgfx(391, absY, absX);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(390, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
//PkingDelay = 15;
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“Your life has been drained!”);
sendMessage(“You choke your opponent in a screen of smoke.”);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 2);
deleteItem(566, getItemSlot(566), 2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 73)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 74 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
if(spellID == 13023) // shadow barrage (lvl 88 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 88)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(566, 3)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(566, 3)==true))
{
hitDiff = 9 + misc.random(48);
playerLevel[3] += hitDiff;
updateRequired = true;
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(383, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 2);
deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 4);
deleteItem(566, getItemSlot(566), 3);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 87)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 88 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
if(spellID == 12871) // ice blitz (lvl 82 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 82)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 3)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 3)==true))
{
hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(37);
castOnPlayer.entangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[6]), 6);
stillgfx(368, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(367, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“You are frozen!”);
PkingDelay = 15;
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 2);
deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 3);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 81)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 82 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
if(spellID == 12911) // blood blitz (lvl 80 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 80)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==true))
{
hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(24);
playerLevel[3] += hitDiff;
updateRequired = true;
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(376, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
sendMessage(“You drain the enemys life and add it to yours”);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“Your life is drained!”);
PkingDelay = 15;
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 4);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 79)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 80 to cast this spell.”);
}
}
[/code][br][size=1]Posted at: October 01, 2006, 11:32:04 AM[/size][hr]Please, help, i am desperate to get these working!
